website_summaries.verdict: A well-made serving tray that comes in a variety of colors. Large and sturdy with narrow handles for a tight hold.
pros: We love how the square profile maximizes the tray space for large plates or multiple dishes
The protective rim is large enough to keep most dishes on the tray while in transit
cons: White finish can stain from dark, hot liquids in some cases

customer_reviews.title: Potential design flaw?
customer_reviews.text: Design Flaw? I am bit disappointed that the handles are almost flush with the bottom of the tray (height of handle holes) allowing for spilled liquid to find its way out of the tray. In my case, it will be sitting atop leather ottomans atop a wood floors; this "flaw" would result in the ottomans and/or floors getting wet in case of spill. I would hope that the tray would be able to catch at least the contents of a small volume cup. I'm going to request a return. PERHAPS just a bad batch, as the picture in the ad does not make it look as close as in my pic (see my attached pic).
customer_reviews.author: Eric C.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the packing nightmare
customer_reviews.text: Let me assure you, there is no quality you could enjoy that would outweigh the nightmare you’ll have getting all the tiny, sharp, painful fibers that are (for some crazy reason) EVERYWHERE throughout the packing on this thing. They get in your clothes, your skin, all over, and there’s no way to avoid it. I’m currently covered with hives with bright red palms from trying to brush this stuff off me. Do I like the tray? Sure. It’s a good tray. It’s white, like in the picture. Seems well made. But I wish I had never bought it.
customer_reviews.author: UPS-ND

customer_reviews.title: It looks great on our ottoman/coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Well made and very attractive tray. It looks great on our ottoman/coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, but I wanted High Gloss Finish so I had to Paint it with High Gloss white paint.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product, but it is not high gloss or super shiny or plastic type finish. It was more like painted plastic/wood. SO I bought some high gloss white spray paint and painted it. Now it looks good and I like it much better. I was hoping it would be like the ones I bought at West Elm, that were high gloss white plastic and very durable. This is made of different product. But it works fine and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria, VA

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tray.
customer_reviews.text: This tray is fabulous. Very pretty green. Goes with a lot of different colors. The color is true. The tray is well made and has a nice weight to it. I have seen much pricier versions in stores. This was a steal for the quality. I wish they offered this tray in more colors. It makes a great statement piece. The size is just perfect for a console or a coffee table. Great job Amazon on carrying terrific home decor objects and pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Shel

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these in white to use in our deeper cabinets above the refrigerator. Needed something less than 17" wide and these fit the bill perfectly and even slide just under the cabinet hinge making them easy to move around. They allow us to more easily store items in the depths of the cabinet and pull them out. Better quality than I expected, these trays seem well-made and quite heavy duty. We may purchase two more for the other shelves. Shipped in individual boxes lined with Styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: aimee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tray
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a new tabletop for a pine side table that couldn't be salvaged. Because it is some sort of solid wood, I was able to simple screw the table apron/legs to this. It's sturdy and beautiful. If you try this, make sure your screws aren't too long, or you'll go through the bottom! I don't worry about the placement of the handles/spillage because I am not sitting it on an ottoman (which is for feet and behinds, not meant to be used as a table). I ordered the black version and was happy that the very smooth finish is NOT glossy. I love matte finishes best.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love the rich purple color, it matches the picture perfectly. Nice sturdy handles so it can support a lot of weight. I originally bought this for my living room ottoman, but now I'm using it to support my KitchenAid 6 qt mixer and accessories in my kitchen. It matches my mixer really well so it was a no brainer for me, and it holds all of the accessories for it so getting my mixer out and using it isn't a hassle anymore, I really love this little tray.
customer_reviews.author: Krugs

customer_reviews.title: Great tray. Darker yellow than it appears!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray and yellow is my favorite color, so I was excited to find this! I will say it is much more of a golden school bus yellow than the sunny lemon color it appears to be in the photo. Still pretty but much less light than I thought it would be, which could impact you if this is to match decor in your home. Otherwise I find the tray well-made and it arrived in good condition. I just wish they took more accurate photos! This one must have been filtered.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie @ PhDiva.blog

customer_reviews.title: very nice finish. Be aware that these are more of ...
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, solid, very nice finish. Be aware that these are more of a satin finish and not the glossier finish you may be accustomed to if you've purchased similar products from West Elm or Crate & Barrel. I actually prefer the finish on these but just know they won't be an exact match but the cost of these is much better and a bigger size than they sell. My one gripe is that they don't do a good job of painting the inside of the handles and so the finish is rough and not thoroughly painted but otherwise they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Nice tray but nasty packing material
customer_reviews.text: The tray is fine. It will do what I want it to. What is up with those nasty fibers all over it, though?
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an ottoman
customer_reviews.text: It's slightly larger than I imagined it being, but it's solid and works perfectly on our ottoman. It does have a small blemish on one corner but it's not a huge deal because you can't see it if you aren't looking for it. Overall, it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tray
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray. It's perfect size and very attractive. I got the Navy blue and it matched perfect with the living room couch. It arrived with a couple of minor chips on the paint but just placed that side on the not so noticeable area. Overall, a very nice tray.
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the yellow tray. It is somewhat of a “dark” yellow. Darker than my mustard bottle if that helps. Otherwise it’s very well made. Heavy. I keep on island to organize things. I wouldn’t want to carry it with food or drinks on it
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, vibrant color
customer_reviews.text: Great accent to our family room. Vibrant color, solid construction. We have had this for close to two years and love it. We mostly use it on the coffee table to hold remotes, some coffee table books, tissues and lotions. Works great in our grey/yellow living room.
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Ugh— misleading rip off
customer_reviews.text: What a horrible amazon experience. It looks like a nice bright yellow; it arrived a hideous gold I would never use. And they don’t let you return it! Not even for a different color. So irritating!
customer_reviews.author: C. Orders

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Using this tray on my coffee table to hold remotes and such and it works great! Heavy enough that it doesn't slide around the coffee table too easily but still light enough to simply pick up and move when we need space on the table! Usually a tray like this at the store would be $35, this was a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Kinamn-Vantiger

customer_reviews.title: Sleek & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a corner table on the sectional sofa, because I have ottomans instead of a coffee table. I lined the tray with that non-slip cushion that comes in a roll like drawer liners and it works perfectly to sit your drinks on while on the couch. Looks very modern, not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Very Sleek
customer_reviews.text: I use this tray as the centerpiece for my kitchen island. My vase of flowers sit inside the tray. It looks very sleek and I receive a lot of complements on the look
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Looks great! Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Arrived quickly. Sits perfectly on my ottoman. Can easily fit two small plates and a few glasses. Great for entertaining and saves room that a coffe table may have taken up. Also looks amazing for such a low price. Great value. I ordered the grey which matches my decor perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color is completely off
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice sturdy tray but the color is completely off. My monitor is very true to color, it has to be because I am a photographer, so the misrepresentation of the color is huge. Amazon shows a nice pastel yellow, but it is actually orange like the filling of a pumpkin pie. I will either return or buy some spray paint and repaint it.
customer_reviews.author: SandiC777

customer_reviews.title: I love this tray
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray. It is very solid and well-made with clean edges. I have it on a wooden coffee table. I was worried it would scratch the table so I put felt pads in each corner and it's been great. I have a candle, coasters, and all the remotes in the tray .
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heavy sturdy tray. It seems like the finish will hold up well. Update: The finish has not held up well. After 1 year of very light use it has lots of little white dings in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: This is not a product, this is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: I'll let the pictures of what I received speak for themselves. I want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: WeboGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great product - serves the intended purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great product - serves the intended purpose for sure. It is square as opposed to a rectangle shape but I knew that going in based on the other reviews I read. That is probably the key piece of info you should know before purchasing - if you want a solid, good looking (and square) ottoman tray than you won't be sorry with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BayAreaBraves

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy not red otherwise nice tray
customer_reviews.text: Received but the color is not as pictured. It’s actually burgundy not red at all! Otherwise nice tray.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great tray!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love!!!! Perfect neutral... exact measurements! One of my favorite things I’ve ordered!!!
customer_reviews.author: kelly mcdermott

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and shape, Good color selection
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the rare square trays available, both online and in stores. Because my ottomans are square, I wanted to mimic the dimensions. I like that it comes in several colors; I bought three, each for a different room: red, blue, and black. They are made of sturdy wood and painted. I am a little worried that the paint might rub off on my beige ottomans, so I'm thinking of adding a protective layer on the bottom but haven't done so yet.
customer_reviews.author: Batwoman

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It was "clunkier" than I anticipated so returned it without problems. The color was good.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Talley

customer_reviews.title: Paint chips
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this tray for a month and the paint is already chipping off. I loved it, but the quality is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee

customer_reviews.title: Great Statement Piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my coffee table, and I love it. Mine fits a vase and several candles. Would highly recommend as a great pop of color.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but paint chips
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was great, it's study and the finish and color were perfect. But I've barely used it and there's already a number of places where paint chipped off at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: qofmiwok

customer_reviews.title: Tray
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful craftsmanship and nice display in our home. Love the red color. Buying the navy blue and yellow too.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This tray is the perfect solution to our problems of where to place drinks/food/etc ...
customer_reviews.text: After having a baby, we had to get rid of our coffee table. This tray is the perfect solution to our problems of where to place drinks/food/etc without a table! It's high quality. It's heavy so it rests securely on our couch cushion. It's nice looking. Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!! Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for 9 months and it’s just sat on my kitchen table the entire time. It hasn’t been used extensively, literally just sits there and holds candles, yet it completely started falling apart. Terrible quality - definitely not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great piece overall!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the structure of this tray. Got thr yellow one to use on a dessert table for a baby shower but it turned out to be more of a mustard yellow and not as pictured. I'm glad that I was able to make it work out though and it blended into the rest of the decor.
customer_reviews.author: Ore

customer_reviews.title: Great tray for great people.
customer_reviews.text: I finally found a tray that I love. It matches the shade of my couch perfectly, and it didn't cost me an arm and a leg. I use it to corral my remotes, and well as the occasional (oh, okay, who am I kidding, "DAILY") cup of coffee or adult beverage. ;) Seems well made, and it's the perfect size to set on one of my ottoman cubes!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Perfect non-glossy finish, smooth to touch, nicely coated Handle grips carved smooth to touch & perfectly place on sides. I purchased two black trays. Product consistency for both pieces. Solid piece. These great trays maybe just what you've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jbolla

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tray!
customer_reviews.text: I used this tray on my ottoman, and really like the way it looks. The tray is a good size, and the quality is very good. I really like this product. I will probably buy another one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: maria ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and color!
customer_reviews.text: This tray is just what I wanted. The paint is well done and beautifully applied on all surfaces. It is heavy and nice size for my coffee table. Practical as well as decorative.
customer_reviews.author: J Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tray for the ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tray for the ottoman. I went with white because it matches everything and works for all seasons (if you're like me and change out your throws and pillows).
customer_reviews.author: Sparklingeyes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! The tray was packaged very well and came earlier than expected! The tray itself is beautiful with a smooth, matte finish. No defects noted. It's very sturdy with a good weight to it. I highly recommend this product and may purchase another!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: They work great, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for our living room, to sit on the ottomans. They work great, easy to clean, very convenient. My only complaint is that they're surprisingly heavy. I thought they'd be lighter, was picturing the CB2 plastic trays, but these are solid wood, definitely heavier than the plastic version. But overall good!
customer_reviews.author: JRT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for the ottoman in my living room. Very well made, heavy piece. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: EDS

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Color is true to picture. I use it on an ottoman displaying plant/picture. I love how it brightens the room!
customer_reviews.author: timothy parks

customer_reviews.title: Not a true red.
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the quality of the tray. Unfortunately, the red is more of a deep burgundy color and will not work with my Christmas decor like I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Wendik

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Shopped and shopped for one in the local stores. No one had one big enough for a large ottoman. This was the perfect size. Holds all the living room stuff and there is room for drinks. Haven’t had a issue yet with drinks if the sweat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: missdehaas

customer_reviews.title: super cute tray
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tray for our basement decor and it matches perfectly and works well to sit on the ottoman and hold remote controls etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow!! Never expected this to be so beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my ottoman table. I was so pleased when they arrived the next day and they were beautiful!! I love the red color and the quality is outstanding! I always get asked where I found these when people see them. Very classy and very durable!! I love these trays!
customer_reviews.author: Pder

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray! It sits in my counter and serves as my coffee corner. It’s simple and pretty. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Pricing NOT Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to purchase this item again, that I originally bought is for $24.49 not even 6 months ago and now they are selling it for $47.44! Regret not purchasing multiple numbers of them, when they were less expensive. They are great trays for presenting client textiles, but in no way worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love this tray
customer_reviews.text: I love this tray. Bigger than expected but I managed to find a spot for it and use it to contain my candles and incense burner. I love it! It's true in color, a nice neutral gray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the tray I am using on my coffee table. It is large enough to hold several drinks, plates and remotes. Although the surface has a smooth finish, my glasses did not slide around on it (I had originally planned to line it with some sort of glass-ware grip liner, but did not need to).
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Z

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small apartment. I had to commandeer space from the dining area for a decent living room space, and as such, we have no table. I have a large sectional and an over-sized ottoman. I set this thing on that ottoman, and now I have a place to put drinks where they won't tip over and the occasional plate. It cleans easily, and looks great. I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, nice size. U like the edging. If a drink spills it stays in the tray and not all over the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and nice size!
customer_reviews.text: I love these trays. I ordered two to take things from my kitchen to my basement. I can easily fit two glasses and two plates on it. I like that it is box like and keeps the items in place when I go down the stairs. The handles are also comfortable. When not in use, they are great decorative pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Zapata

customer_reviews.title: Furniture grade bright white paint looks chic.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon did it again! Found furniture grade gloss white painted trays for about a third of price of similar trays. Packaging was beat up but trays were protected.
customer_reviews.author: Bethy

customer_reviews.title: Giant chip in the paint
customer_reviews.text: This tray would have been perfect for my nursery except when it arrived a huge piece of it had chipped off the flat side. I tried to exchange it for another one but they were sold out and the window to return it closed while I was hospitalized.
customer_reviews.author: sarah yi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Very good size, arrived very well packed in perfect condition. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karin Menzel

customer_reviews.title: Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for grouping small vases with flowers on my sofa table. Very well built. I'm extremely happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to the coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the coffee table. I ordered white it arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It could also be used as a serving tray.
customer_reviews.author: Bmoregurl23

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and thick
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and thick. Purchased to place on Ottoman to hold glasses and remote controls. Good quality and glasses set nicely. Great buy, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dob2015

customer_reviews.title: That the size us very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The color is absolutely beautiful. It fits my table perfectly. Very happy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray! So Happy with It!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous tray. Using this for my large ottoman for clickers, etc. This tray has a nice weight to it and is also sleek. Cleans easily. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Proper Bostonian

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and paint has endured a lot of use
customer_reviews.text: the perfect size for our side table, sturdy and heavy, no problems yet with scrapes in paint - and I use it every day and set all kinds of things on it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan J

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this tray. I have 4 of them in green. Good quality and very nice color.
customer_reviews.author: D. Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Chipped Paint
customer_reviews.text: This is the right size and color that I wanted but it came with the paint chipped in the corners. Little disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amina

customer_reviews.title: loved them so much I purchased three more for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought four trays for myself, loved them so much I purchased three more for my boss's house warming gift as a group present. They are large and heavy enough to be stable on a bed or ottoman, and we use them as a food tray when watching tv. Beautiful colors, I got the eggplant, bright yellow, lime green, navy and white. The customer service is spot on, bravo! YEAH TO THE TRAY!!
customer_reviews.author: sandandh2o

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice.
customer_reviews.text: Solid wood, doesn't feel cheap at all. It was larger than I expected which was nice. The paint job is done well so I don't expect it to chip or crack.
customer_reviews.author: Tah

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this tray! Perfect on our outdoor cushioned deck ottoman for serving guests snacks, drinks, etc. Sturdy construction. Beautiful medium gray color. Perfect size. Couldn't be happier! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: MAC2NITE

customer_reviews.title: This was rather pricey but it's the perfect size for my sofa
customer_reviews.text: This was rather pricey but it's the perfect size for my sofa. I use this on the center cushion of my sofa with 3 cushions. I use this is a poor man's coffee table and it's held up well. Loses some paint from things that rub against it but overall a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CrzyShane

customer_reviews.title: with no signs of wear and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have the black tray, and we've used it for almost six months now. It's held up perfectly, with no signs of wear and is easy to clean. It's also an elegant tray: I bought it just to carry our breakfast coffee back to bed ;) but I've ended up using it as a serving tray when we have parties.
customer_reviews.author: tangerine

customer_reviews.title: Great tray table for ottoman.  Outstanding quality and great looks.
customer_reviews.text: Great tray table for our ottoman. The quality of the materials and the paint finish is very good. This is a very good looking addition to our rec room and works great for setting drinks, the remote, or other miscellaneous items on our ottoman. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Love the Color!
customer_reviews.text: Deep eggplant, could be mistaken for dark cherry wood. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: ENSeeber

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality and design.
customer_reviews.text: Nice! Has a wonderful heft to it. Solid in construction. Looks good and serves well. It fit the bill exactly for what I needed. It arrived with a ding or two but I needed to use it immediately so didn't want to send it back. I don't even notice the dings any more...I am the kind to obsess.
customer_reviews.author: MeeMee

customer_reviews.title: This tray is perfect for our ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This tray is perfect for our ottoman. We can set drinks on it and not worry about them falling over when bumped. I woudl amke sure to check the dimensions for your own space because it is a little large.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great Tray
customer_reviews.text: This tray is a great size and weight. It's heavy enough to stay put. Has a nice sheen and color. Happy I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Venus Rising

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Color. Unfortunately Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and the look, but like other reviewers stated, it came damaged and chipped, despite being well-boxed. Sadly, I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Spira

customer_reviews.title: pretty color and good quality but too large for what I needed and I cannot return it
customer_reviews.text: nice color yellow and good quality but too large for what I wanted to use it for
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on top of the couch. We use it as a tray for snacks, drinks or dinner while watching TV and it's usually just sitting in the middle of the couch. It looks very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Item tooo heavy!!
customer_reviews.text: This item had to weight 10-15 pounds. It was too heavy!!! Because I waited too long to return I lost money on this item. Did not like at all.
customer_reviews.author: Monkeyface

customer_reviews.title: Very nicely made tray for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made tray for the price! It looks like it could have cost a lot more. I use this to display all of the liquor bottles at my home bar and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Nika

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two one was perfect the other came all banged up chipped paint on inside and out
customer_reviews.author: Britney Limon

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition. Another reviewer mentioned that the white was ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition. Another reviewer mentioned that the white was kind of ivory, but it looks white to me. Unless you're setting a white tray on a white table, the shade of white shouldn't be of much concern.
customer_reviews.author: amberback

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the finish, size and quality of this tray. Definitely a great price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, multipurpose, heavier than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again. I carried drinks to the patio and it was great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Zaucha

customer_reviews.title: Love these trays
customer_reviews.text: Love these trays! I bought 2 and have them sitting on a 4 foot long ottoman in our family room. Exactly the eggplant purple color I wanted, very solid trays.
customer_reviews.author: JCF135

customer_reviews.title: The finish is a dark matte and is beautiful. I'm not sure if it will hold up ...
customer_reviews.text: Very elegant and larger size wooden tray. The finish is a dark matte and is beautiful. I'm not sure if it will hold up to water exposure. We are using it on the counter as a coffee caddy.
customer_reviews.author: chipharv

customer_reviews.title: Beauty for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tray for atop a shelf. I didn't want to spend over $50. I searched Amazon & hound this tray. Beautiful for the price. I love it and if Inerded another I would get the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie ATop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Super solid and heavy.  Great piece!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Way more solid and heavy a piece than expected. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Tree Brosnan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our living room! Came in perfect condition, no scratches or marks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.text: paint chipping in corners, like paint sorta gunked hun, very very heavy , sturdy for sure

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed on my square ottoman. As ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed on my square ottoman. As others noted, it is large and square. There's room for both a decor item and people's coffee mugs. Color is true to picture.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the out side. Very thick and i really liked it
customer_reviews.author: Lisa R Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed. No strong Oder or any defects! Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality was poor and very heavy.
customer_reviews.text: The trays are very heavy to be considered a serving tray. Not pleased with the quality. They are bulky which i didn't expect. I'm a avid Amazon shopper and first time unable to return product.
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Tray
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Only complaint is that it smelled badly upon arrival and needed to air out for a week or more.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Payne

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Color is not white more off white both trays came with black marks on edges that won't come off
customer_reviews.author: jack atwell

customer_reviews.title: fantastic little tray
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for an ottoman I have. Finally, I have something to put my drinks and food on. It came with no defects and looked true to the online pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sharif

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the ottoman I wanted it for. Price was great.
customer_reviews.author: JW1970

product_meta.title: Convenience Concepts Palm Beach Tray, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteExciting new design from Convenience Concepts. Inc. that combines urban design and and multi-function use. The Palm Beach Serving Tray coordinates easily with exsisting decor or with the Palm Beach End, Coffee, and Console Tables. Tray can be reversed to use as a flat surface, or for serving.
feature_bullets: Cut Out Handles and no assembly required
Great For Use With Guest and Family Gatherings
